title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 79.2 - Allowed activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 79.2 - Allowed activity

State Regulations

Public access to the Lakeview and Black Pond beaches and
the associated dune access trails is permitted only between sunrise and 10
p.m., unless specified otherwise by official posted notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
79.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
